short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show Lexandria results when searching on Google

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Lexandria Chrome extension - the ultimate search tool for finding reliable information online!

Are you tired of endless scrolling and unreliable search results? The Lexandria Chrome extension provides users with matching results from trusted sources, including documents, videos, and podcasts. 

The extension integrates seamlessly with Google search, making it easy to use and enhancing your online search experience.

Download the Lexandria extension today and take your online searches to the next level!
